channel.title: GKE on Longhorn Manual Test Cases
channel.description: Recent content in GKE on Longhorn Manual Test Cases

item.title: [Expand Volume](https://longhorn.io/docs/1.3.0/advanced-resources/support-managed-k8s-service/manage-node-group-on-gke/)
item.description:
1. Create GKE cluster with 3 nodes and install Longhorn.

  2. Create deployment and write some data to it.

  3. In Longhorn, set replica-replenishment-wait-interval to 0.

  4. Add a new node-pool. Later Longhorn components will be automatically deployed on the nodes in this pool.

  5. Using Longhorn UI to disable the disk scheduling and request eviction for nodes in the old node-pool.

item.title: [Upgrade K8s](https://longhorn.io/docs/1.3.0/advanced-resources/support-managed-k8s-service/upgrade-k8s-on-gke/)
item.description:
1. Create GKE cluster with 3 nodes and install Longhorn.
  2. Create deployment and write some data to it.
  3. In Longhorn, set replica-replenishment-wait-interval to 0.
  4. See Upgrading the cluster and Upgrading node pools for instructions.
  5. Check the deployment in step 2 still running and data exist.
